Package org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.projects

This package is the internal counterpart of the external org.apache.flex.compiler.projects package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISourceFileHandler
    Factory interface for creating CompilationUnits.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ASCProject
    Implementation class for an asc style project.
    ASProject
    Implementation base class to implement functionality common to all IASProject implementations.
    ASSourceFileHandler
    Implementation of ISourceFileHandler that constructs ASCompilationUnit's.
    CompilerProject
    Abstract class used to share implementation of some ICompilerProject methods across multiple concrete implementation classes.
    ConfigManager
    Manager handles storing config variables passed in from the command line or from other project properties.
    DefinitionPriority
    This class encapsulates information about the priority of definitions defined in a compilation unit.
    DependencyGraph
    Class to track dependencies in a CompilerProject.
    DependencyGraph.Dependency  
    FlexProject
    FlexProject extends ASProject to add support for compiling .mxml, .css, and .properties files.
    FlexProjectConfigurator
    This class applies configuration settings to a FlexProject.
    FXGSourceFileHandler
    Implementation of ISourceFileHandler that constructs FXGCompilationUnit's
    LibraryDependencyGraph
    A dependency graph of libraries.
    LibraryPathManager
    Manages the library path of a ASProject.
    MXMLSourceFileHandler
    Implementation of ISourceFileHandler that can constructs MXMLSourceFileHandler's.
    ResourceBundleSourceFileHandler
    Implementation of ISourceFileHandler that constructs ResourceBundleCompilationUnit's
    SourcePathManager
    Maintains a source path for a ASProject.
    SourcePathManager.QNameFile  
    ThemeUtilities
    Utilities for theme-related operations.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DefinitionPriority.BasePriority  

Package org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.projects Description

This package is the internal counterpart of the external org.apache.flex.compiler.projects package.

See the description of the org.apache.flex.compiler package for an explanation of how the compiler code is organized into external and internal packages.
